api_list.name: NewsFirst English - Sri Lanka
api_list.description: NewsFirst English delivers the latest news and insights from Sri Lanka, covering politics, sports, entertainment, and more. Stay informed and connected with up-to-date coverage and analysis tailored for an international audience. Subscribe to NewsFirst English for the top stories from the island nation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sri-lanka-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com/articles/newsfirst"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sri-lanka-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
